biotools.summary: Constructed based on the rising popularity of periplasmic expression, this tool is a sequence-based predictor with a two-stage architecture that estimates the expression level and yield of soluble protein in the periplasm of E. coli.

bioschemas.name: Periscope
bioschemas.summary: Constructed based on the rising popularity of periplasmic expression, this tool is a sequence-based predictor with a two-stage architecture that estimates the expression level and yield of soluble protein in the periplasm of E. coli.
